# Returns

## Usage
`@returns {<Type>} <description>`
 
## Overview
The `@returns` tag documents the value that a function returns.

## Example
```javascript
/**
 * @returns {Boolean} Returns true.
 */
const funcA = () => {
    return true;
}
```

**[_More Info_](http://usejsdoc.org/tags-returns.html)**
